name: A Small FPS Game
description:
A Small FPS Game, 

I hope you enjoy it, the web version is a bit buggy. For the web version, if it doesn't capture your mouse, just spam left and right-click, it should work eventually ¯\_(ツ)_/. Just make sure that if you want the full experience, download it and run it. Other than that, enjoy it (I hope).
